revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Old Chateau |image = [[File:Old Chateau.png|300px]] |caption = An outside view of the Old Chateau. |tokens = 52,500 |location = West of Route 205. }} The '''Old Chateau''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 853,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || colspan=2 rowspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Haunter.png|40px]] Haunter |- | [[File:Gengar.png|40px]] Gengar |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Rotom.png|40px]] Rotom ||<center>4,200,000 || colspan=3|<center>N/A |- |}
==Items==
<tabs> <tab name="Base"> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 250 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 1 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Dowsing Machine}} || 1 || 37.49% || 36.08% || 33.93% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Red Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || 1 || 10.01% || 10.52% || 11.30% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Dread Plate}} || 1 || 1.34% || 1.74% || 2.35% || 3.37% |- | {{Bag2|Spooky Plate}} || 1 || 1.34% || 1.74% || 2.35% || 3.37% |- | {{Bag2|Zap Plate}} || 1 || 1.34% || 1.74% || 2.35% || 3.37% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Odd Keystone}} || 1 || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.25% || 2.02% |- | {{Bag2|Spell Tag}} || 1 || 0.50% || 0.80% || 1.25% || 2.02% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> After reaching [[Alola]], the drop chance for items will be [[Dungeons#Dungeon Loot Regional Debuff|debuffed]].
